page.description: Change the Z-Order of a window i.e. Back,Front.
page.discussion: The .ZORDER() method sets the window's z-order stacking position.This is the order in which open MDI child windows are stacked on top of each other. A typical use of this command would be to create a form that acts as "wallpaper". i.e. a form that acts like the Windows desktop, which allows you to set wallpaper. Limitations:Desktop applications only.
page.example: dim ptr as P dim ptr2 as P ptr = form.view("customerInfo") ptr2 = form.view("invoices") ptr2.zorder("after:customerinfo")
